code: import ratesData from'./rates.json';export default function tryConvert(money,code){var encode=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:true;var input=parseFloat(money);if(Number.isNaN(input)){return'';}var currency=ratesData.rates[0].value.find(function(item){return item.code===code;});if(!currency){return'';}var sell=parseFloat(currency.sell.replace(',',''));var output=encode?input*sell:input/sell;var rounded=Math.round(output*1000)/1000;return rounded.toString();}
